title: Deadly Odds 5.0
description: In Wyler's 5.0 installment of the Deadly Odds techno-thriller series, Arnold Gold-reformed hacker turned security consultant-confronts a mysterious new enemy: a treacherous ace hacker who deliberately destroyed two high-technology companies. With Arnold's personal life spinning out of control, he must juggle cyber-detective work while forming a talented team to grow his cyber-crime fighting company.
author: Allen Wyler
